title: Official Project Start
description: Lit project officially started after conceptual discussions with Gemini. `lit-app` repository created on GitHub. Initial GDD structure (v1) created on GitHub Wiki.

title: Visual Timeline Created
description: Developed the Changelog page (`/changelog`) with React component, reading data from JSON. Implemented 'Liquid Glass' style. Created local HTML tool for adding entries.

title: Publish first landing page
description: Temporary landing page with usefull links and changelog.

title: Update Default Icon to Provisory Fav icon
description: Update Default Icon to Provisory Fav icon
